protein.specific_function: Activates pro-caspase-1 and pro-caspase-8. Potentiates CASP8-mediated apoptosis. Activates NF-kappa-B

reference.reference_text: Inohara N, del Peso L, Koseki T, Chen S, Nunez G: RICK, a novel protein kinase containing a caspase recruitment domain, interacts with CLARP and regulates CD95-mediated apoptosis. J Biol Chem. 1998 May 15;273(20):12296-300.
